name: Deep Dive (arsith)
description:
• WASD - Move
  • Semicolon (;) - Put treasure
  • Semicolon (;) + W/D - Throw treasure towards a direction
  • Space - Jump
  • ESC - Reset level

Dive Deep into The Deep Sea Temple and collect all the treasures you can find there! You don’t need to worry about drowning, but the water will try to pull you up all the time… unless you bring the treasure with you. And then, bring yourself to the portal with the treasure to win!

This is a game made for the Ludum Dare 48. Here's the link to the game page.
